experienceData.name: Unizoy
experienceData.title: Full Stack Developer (Intern)
description: Developed and optimized a full-stack (ReactJS + NestJS) Trader Management Software — implemented frontend UI based on Figma designs and reduced backend API latency from 900ms+ to under 200ms through query optimization and efficient data handling.

Built AI-driven chatbot solutions — designed and implemented chatbot UIs, integrated WhatsApp webhooks, and contributed to developing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbots for Unizoy’s AI platform.
